csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="in-text"
      version="1.0"
      xml:lang="en">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; " prefix="(" suffix=")">
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <names variable="author">
          <name />
          <substitute>
            <text variable="title" />
          </substitute>
        </names>
        <date variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year" />
        </date>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>

input.abstract: An interesting book by an interesting author.
input.title: Book A

input.abstract: An old contribution to a new field.
input.title: Book B
